paper_abstract: In this paper we show a lower bound for the on-line version of Heilbronn's triangle problem in d dimensions. Specifically, we provide an incremental construction for positioning n points in the d-dimensional unit cube, for which every simplex defined by d + 1 of these points has volume Omega (1/n ((d+1)) (In (d-2)-0.265d+2.269)) (for d >= 5).
paper_title: The on-line Heilbronn's triangle problem in d dimensions
